thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 4 of 1782
thread.title: Yuri

author: Yuri
title: Yuri
text:
I spent the past few days searching online for airline tickets using a few complicated and cumbersome automated infrastructures only to find that after going through their entire shopping experience, the tickets I wanted were no longer available and/or the price I expected to pay was not at all what was about to be charged. That experience left me unspeakably frustrated. (to put it kindly)
I discovered FlightHub this morning and much to my surprise and delight, I got everything I wanted in less that 30-minutes, PLUS the added bonus of booking a hotel room for the night before travel departure with parking for the week and a shuttle to the airport in the morning.
Thank You FlightHub!!!
